channel.title: Comments on: Joining the development of TurboGears
channel.description: Notes from a disciplined software developer

item.title: By: Andrew Basson
item.dc:creator: Andrew Basson
item.description:
Hi Gustavo,
Downloaded Animador from svn. The Getting Started instructions point 4 needs to change for the Animador egg to be created in the virtualenv.
Change : ./setup.py develop to: python setup.py develop
HTH, Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Gustavo,

Downloaded Animador from svn. The Getting Started instructions point 4 needs to change for the Animador egg to be created in the virtualenv.

Change : ./setup.py develop to:
python setup.py develop

HTH, Andrew.

item.title: By: Gustavo
item.dc:creator: Gustavo
item.description:
Thanks, Roger and Florent!
@Florent: Sure, I'll do it once the plugin is finished.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, Roger and Florent!

@Florent: Sure, I’ll do it once the plugin is finished.

and don't forget to post about your OpenId usage in tg2 :-)
item.content:encoded:
